meta.title: Golden Retriever Excessive Barking: Causes & Solutions
meta.description: Do Golden Retrievers bark a lot? Learn why your Golden is barking and how to stop it.

hero.title: Why Is My Golden Retriever Barking?
hero.subtitle: Goldens aren't known as yappers, but they will bark for attention or when bored.

symptoms_list: Demand barking (barking at you for food/play)

solutions_list.title: Ignore Demand Barking
solutions_list.description: Never reward barking with attention. Turn your back until they are quiet.

solutions_list.title: More Mental Stimulation
solutions_list.description: A bored Golden is a noisy Golden. Use puzzle toys.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.
